mapper.insert: insert into sky_take_out.address_book (address_book.user_id, address_book.consignee, address_book.sex, address_book.phone, address_book.province_code, address_book.province_name, address_book.city_code, address_book.city_name, address_book.district_code, address_book.district_name, address_book.detail, address_book.label) values (#{userId}, #{consignee}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{provinceCode}, #{provinceName}, #{cityCode}, #{cityName}, #{districtCode}, #{districtName}, #{detail}, #{label});
